de.bolz.android.taglocate.protocol
Class SettingsSingleton

java.lang.Object
  de.bolz.android.taglocate.protocol.SettingsSingleton

public final class SettingsSingleton
extends java.lang.Object

This singleton class stores various global configuration values to make them concurrently accessible from different classes during runtime and to avoid inconsistencies.

Author:
Johannes Bolz
